article.title: Army Modifies Personnel Payment System Contract
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton Inc., McLean, Virginia, was awarded a $12,613,178 modification (P00008) to contract W15QKN-14-C-0032 for support services for the Program Executive Office Enterprise Information Systems Integrated Personnel and Pay System Army (PD-IPPS-A). Fiscal 2015 research, development, test and evaluation funds in the amount of $12,613,178 were obligated at the time of the award. The estimated completion date is Jan. 31, 2016. Work will be performed in McLean, Virginia. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.?Â
